articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Canada's TSX posts first close above 20,000 as resource shares rally - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock market index closed above the 20,000 level for the first time on Friday as higher commodity prices bolstered the shares of resource companies.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.author: Fergal Smith
articles.title: Canada's TSX climbs above 20,000, loonie posts 6-year high as oil rallies - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock market index climbed above the 20,000 threshold for the first time on Tuesday while the loonie notched a six-year high, with sentiment underpinned by gains in oil and data showing strong economic growth in the first quarter.
